Today, Sutherland is clean with 2 ft @11s W swell and light 6 mph SSE winds. Good spots like Melvich and Strathy are working well, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell picks up to 5 ft @13s WNW with light 7 mph S winds, making for a fun day at spots like Armadale Bay and Sango Bay. On the day after, expect 4 ft @12s WNW with similar winds, keeping the surf lively across the region. Best: tomorrow.
